
## usage
```
$ ./ctrsploit_linux_amd64 env s 
INFO[0000] ===========Seccomp=========
kernel supported: ✔
seccomp enabled in current container: ✘
```

```
# ./ctrsploit_linux_amd64  env  s
INFO[0000] ===========Seccomp=========
kernel supported: ✔
seccomp enabled in current container: ✔
seccomp mode: filter
```
